*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Dark}} }} ==Description== The '''Dread Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Dread Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Dark Gems]] {{Gem|Dark}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Dread Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Team Rockets Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Dark Cave|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Jagged Pass|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Magma Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Aqua Hideout|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Old Chateau|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Newmoon Island|Epic}} {{LootItem|Giant Chasm|Epic}} {{LootItem|Kalos Power Plant|Epic}} {{LootItem|Lost Hotel|Epic}} {{LootItem|Team Flare Secret HQ|Epic}} {{LootItem|Po Town|Epic}} {{LootItem|Resolution Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Tower of Darkness|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
